description:
Reform UK mayoral candidate Andrea Jenkyns has been condemned for rejecting climate science and promising Trump-style budget cuts, despite standing in a high climate risk area. The former Conservative MP, who defected to Nigel Farage’s party in November, is tipped to become Mayor of Greater Lincolnshire in Thursday’s local elections, polling at 40 percent with […]

The post Reform Candidate Andrea Jenkyns Vows Climate Cuts in Flood Risk Lincolnshire appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Reform Candidate Andrea Jenkyns Vows Climate Cuts in Flood Risk Lincolnshire
